I'm Just a girl

I'm a student in my final year, majoring in Mathematics and Computer Science and minoring in Biology. When I'm not studying, you'll find me exploring destinations, discovering new music, getting lost in a good book, or indulging in all things coffee-related. This website is where I share my academic journey, projects, and personal interests.

Education

Toronto Metropolitan University, Toronto


BSc., Mathematics and its Applications (Honours)
May 2024 (Expected)
Concentration in Computer Science and a Minor in Biology
Coursework: Machine Learning, Statistics, Database Systems, Abstract Algebra, Analysis
Extracurricular: Ryerson Science Society, Math Director and External Committee Member
Awards: Dean's List (2021), Undergraduate Student Research Award (USRA)
